context_bundle.summary: CRDTs (Conflict-Free Replicated Data Types) automatically resolve conflicts: G-Counter (grow-only counter), PN-Counter (increment/decrement), G-Set (grow-only set), OR-Set (observed-remove set), LWW-Register (last-write-wins). Operations commute, replicas converge without coordination.

onboarding.quick_start: CRDTs (Conflict-Free Replicated Data Types) automatically resolve conflicts: G-Counter (grow-only counter), PN-Counter (increment/decrement), G-Set (grow-only set), OR-Set (observed-remove set), LWW-Register (last-write-wins). Operations commute, replicas converge without coordination.
